member.name: M:OASP4Net.Business.Common.BookingManagement.Controller.BookingController.BookingBooking(OASP4Net.Business.Common.BookingManagement.Dto.BookingDto)
member.summary: Method to make a reservation with potentiel guests. The method returns the reservation token with the format: {(CB_|GB_)}{now.Year}{now.Month:00}{now.Day:00}{_}{MD5({Host/Guest-email}{now.Year}{now.Month:00}{now.Day:00}{now.Hour:00}{now.Minute:00}{now.Second:00})}
member.response: Internal Server Error. The search process ended with error.
